name: Serenic Software
description:
Serenic Software is a global provider of financial and business management software products that satisfy the unique and sophisticated functionality requirements of nonprofits (NPOs), international non-governmental organizations (NGOs), K-12 education and the public sector. Serenic develops fund accounting software and is the exclusive developer of the payroll and human resources products for Microsoft Dynamics NAV.
The Company is a Gold ERP and ISV vendor and a development partner for Microsoft.
